<img src="http://eums.eusa.ed.ac.uk/wp-content/uploads/images/w620/posters/20140516_summer.jpg" alt="Concert poster" width="620" height="441" /></a>

The Edinburgh University Music Society's Chorus, Sinfonia and Symphony Orchestra are proud to present their Summer Concert.</p>

The programme is as follows:</p>

Sibelius</strong> Symphony No. 7
Rutter</strong> The Sprig of Thyme
Brahms</strong> Tragic Overture
Mozart</strong> Magic Flute Overture

Doors open at 7pm, and it is recommended that you arrive early to ensure that you are not disappointed!</p>

To buy tickets, click the link below:</p>
